title: vladimirdju
author: vladimirdju
content: Greetings everyone,I'm curious to know your thoughts on this matter.https://i.ibb.co/R2zKy7c/Fsy57-Wi-Xw-AA3-Gp9.png

comments.author: PAMPT
comments.body: I dunno what this is but MASK is already doing every bloody thing twitter may need. MASK should be integrated in twitter pages and supported as a subscription payment method. They at twitter had strenuous ponderation on cons of adding MASK but people like them big fat moguls are not vested in crypto tech which is why it takes them extra time to stomach information. This process is slow unless u come and pitch the thing to them. Explain and thrill their minds. I was delegated to convey the facts about MASK to twitter board and I nailed it damn well. Twitter will drum up full support for MASK token and I will be in benefit.

comments.author: vladimirdju
